page.title: 20SCHOOL CONTINUED
page.content: AND NOT RUNNING IN THE CORRIDORS. THE SCHOOL WENT COMPREHENSIVE IN 1973.UNTIL 1973,YOU COULD LEAVE AT 14 OR 15 YEARS,IF YOU WANTED TO.SCHOOL DINNERS WERE ONLY FOR THOSE LIVING IN THE VILLAGES.GRACE WAS SAID BEFORE DINNER. NOW THE HEADMISTRESS IS MRS.COTTEE. THERE ARE 928 PUPILS AND 55 TEACHERS;THE SCHOOL IS GETTING SMALLER.RULES HAVE CHANGED.NOW THERE ARE MORE COURSES AND SCHOOL VISITS AVAILABLE;20 YEARS AGO, THERE WAS NO WORK EXPERIENCE SCHEME OR INSIGHT INTO INDUSTRY CONFERENCE.UNIFORM IS NOW BLUE AND WHITE.LESSONS LAST 50 MINUTES OR 45 MINUTES AND THERE ARE 6 A DAY.THE SCHOOL HAS A VERY GOOD REPUTATION. WRITTEN BY SECOND YEAR PUPILS.
